title: Add tests for parse_state and parse_priority CLI parsers
description: The parse_state() and parse_priority() functions in commands/mod.rs lack unit tests, which allowed the Rejected state to be added to the State enum without updating the CLI parser. Add comprehensive tests covering all valid states and priorities, case-insensitive matching, aliases (e.g., 'open' -> Backlog), and error cases for invalid inputs. This will prevent similar gaps in future state additions.
